required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pronator Quadratus Preservation Following Volar Plate Fixation. RCT
clinical_study.official_title: Preservation vs (Repair or Not Repair) Pronator Quadratus in the Volar Plating of Distal Radial Fracture. Randomized Controlled Clinical Trial

collaborator.agency: SOCIEDAD CHILENA DE ORTOPEDIA Y TRAUMATOLOGIA

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine pronator quadrutus preservation have clinical impact following volar plate fixation

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Clinical impact in dairy life with a functional score

intervention.intervention_name: Pronator quadratus preservation after volar plate fixation in wrist fractures
intervention.description: Pronator quadratus preservation after volar plate fixation in wrist fractures

intervention.intervention_name: Pronator quadratus repair after volar plate fixation in wrist fractures
intervention.description: Pronator quadratus repair after volar plate fixation in wrist fractures

intervention.intervention_name: Pronator quadratus nonrepair after volar plate fixation in wrist fractures
intervention.description: Pronator quadratus nonrepair after volar plate fixation in wrist fractures

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Fractures of distal radius with instability (Aofoundation.org)
- Age between 15-75 años
- Informed consent approval for ethical comitte
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previos surgery of the hand, wrist or forearm
- Inflammatory arthropathy
- Carpal tunel syndrome
- Sensory or mixed neuropathy
- Bilater wrist fracture
- Functional deficits of ipsilateral extremity
- Functional deficits of contralateral extremity
- Complications after surgery with motor deficit
- Disease that can evolve with neuropathy during study time

facility.name: Universidad de la Frontera, Hernan Henriquez Aravena Hospital
